name: Tank Tactics
description:
Mission statement:
"Our mission is to let you blow up stuff"

We grew up playing game on the Super Nintendo. When we bought a game we got the whole game. That retro business model still works in our hearts. And that is the deal we are proposing to you... ...when our game comes out.

Tank Tactics is our first game. It's a top down tank shooter, built for Nintendo standards. Which means we have an Asian difficulty level. dynamic bullet hell levels, awesome graphics and mind quenching puzzles.

On top of that (and because time doesn't stand still) we've added, excellent enemy AI and eye burning visual effects.


Should you like our game you can support us on Indiegogo and Steam.
